body:
Comment 4 by **cole.mickens**: 
I apologize, I understand now. I was under the impression those scripts were slightly
overkill and that re-running ./make.bash with an alternative GOOS/GOARCH would suffice.
I know realize that it's probably make.bash that is cleaning up the things I need. (It
also ends up rebuilding host tools each time which makes it much slower than it needs to
be).

Thanks, I'll just adjust my scripts to follow more closely what yours do.
